#Summary

This script pulls more up to date coral data from the Living Oceans Foundation French Polynesia report, which was published in 2017. This will be used to assess current status of benthic habitats on Tetiaroa

#Set up 
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(pdftables)

source(here('workflow/R/common.R'))

#file paths
goal     <- 'hab'
scenario <- 'v2020'
#dir_anx       <- file.path(dir_M, 'git-annex/globalprep') 
dir_goal      <- file.path(here('prep/bd',goal, scenario))
#dir_goal_anx  <- file.path(dir_anx, goal, scenario)
dir_github    <- '~/github/tet-prep'

pdf_api <- "yclryli65jdy"
```

Use pdftables to convert the data on page 21 of the pdf
```{r}

convert_pdf(file.path(dir_goal,"_raw_data/LOF_fp_habtable_2017.pdf"), "fp_tabtable.csv", api_key = pdf_api)
```
